components.description: A green bottle of champagne or sparkling wine with label, its cork popping to shoot out its bubbly contents. Used for a range of celebratory occasions, such as New Year's Eve, birthdays, weddings, or other life accomplishments.
components.title: Bottle with Popping Cork

description: A green bottle of champagne or sparkling wine with label, its cork popping to shoot out its bubbly contents. Used for a range of celebratory occasions, such as New Year's Eve, birthdays, weddings, or other life accomplishments.
title: Bottle with Popping Cork

version.description: The Unicode Consortium has approved the following 41 emoji characters as part of Unicode 8.0, released on June 17, 2015. This is comprised of 37 new emojis, plus five emoji modifiers. Find out more about this update on the Emojipedia Blog.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Beverage and food symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A bottle of champagne or sparkling wine¬†used for celebrations such as New Year's Eve. Bottle With Popping Cork was approved as part of Unico http://emojipedia.org/bottle-with-popping-cork/
emoji_net_data.name: bottle with popping cork

bn:00087321v: To drink or imbibe with vigour or relish; to drink copiously; to swallow in large draughts.
To consume a liquid through the mouth.
To consume (a liquid) through the mouth.

bn:00022661n: Material derived from the cork oak
Cork is an impermeable, buoyant material, a prime-subset of bark tissue that is harvested for commercial use primarily from Quercus suber, which is endemic to southwest Europe and northwest Africa.
The thick light porous outer bark of the cork oak, used widely as an insulator and for stoppers for bottles, casks, etc.
Outer bark of the cork oak; used for stoppers for bottles etc.
A material harvested from the Cork oak tree

bn:00010183n: Kind of liquid which is specifically prepared for human consumption
Any one of various liquids for drinking.
Drinks, or beverages, are liquids specifically prepared for human consumption.

bn:00008462n: A room or establishment where alcoholic drinks are served over a counter
A business licensed to sell intoxicating beverages for consumption on the premises, or the premises themselves
A bar or barroom; a room where alcoholic beverages are served on tap.
A bar is a retail business establishment that serves alcoholic drinks -- beer, wine, liquor, and cocktails -- for consumption on the premises.
A room where alcoholic drinks are served over a counter.
Establishment serving alcoholic beverages for consumption on the premises
The top surface of a bar (counter for serving drinks).
A public house, where beverages, primarily alcoholic, may be bought and drunk. Many pubs also provide food and/or entertainment.
An establishment licensed to sell alcoholic beverages to be consumed on or off the premises; they often provide meals and sometimes accommodation.
A list of addresses that serves as a reference point for other addresses.
A business licensed to sell alcoholic drinks for consumption on the premises, or the premises themselves; public house.
Also known as a lounge in some cases

bn:00028749n: A single serving of a beverage

bn:00012339n: A glass or plastic vessel used for storing drinks or other liquids; typically cylindrical without handles and with a narrow neck that can be plugged or capped
A bottle is a rigid container with a neck that is narrower than the body and a "mouth".
A container, typically made of glass and having a tapered neck, used for holding liquids.
A container, typically made of glass or plastic and having a tapered neck, used primarily for holding liquids.

bn:00080022n: An alcoholic beverage made by fermenting juice of grapes.
Wine is an alcoholic beverage made from fermented grapes or other fruits.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the bottle with popping cork emoji is rendered with a sense of dynamic celebration, featuring a classic glass bottle with a prominent cork seemingly mid-ejection. Apple‚Äôs characteristic glossy finish and soft gradients give the liquid inside a rich, inviting appearance, while the cork's upward trajectory is captured with crisp detail and realistic lighting. This emoji vividly symbolizes moments of joy, achievement, and festive occasions, often used to convey excitement for parties, congratulations, or good news.
